scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/core/dist packages/agent/dist packages/control-plane/dist packages/forum/dist packages/issue/dist packages/cli/dist packages/server/dist
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:packages && chmod +x packages/cli/dist/cli.js && chmod +x packages/server/dist/cli.js
scripts.build:packages: tsc -p packages/core/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/agent/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/control-plane/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/forum/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/issue/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/server/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/cli/tsconfig.build.json
scripts.pack:smoke: bun run build && bun run scripts/pack-smoke.ts
scripts.check:core: bun run typecheck && bun run build && bun test
scripts.check: bun run guardrails && bun run check:core
scripts.publish:all: bun run lock:refresh && bun run build && bun run verify:packed-internal-deps && bun publish --cwd packages/core --access public && bun publish --cwd packages/agent --access public && bun publish --cwd packages/control-plane --access public && bun publish --cwd packages/forum --access public && bun publish --cwd packages/issue --access public && bun publish --cwd packages/server --access public && bun publish --cwd packages/cli --access public
